name: Do You Yield?
description:
This is a quiz game with a twist; sometimes, you simply have to yield to cut your losses. The goal of the game is to get as many points as possible. 

The game is made in Godot and the sound effects are made in https://sfxr.me/. 

Music:

https://opengameart.org/content/next-to-you

https://opengameart.org/content/where-was-i
